title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: Currently, there is no default folder set for importing projects.
EB: It would be beneficial if the import feature could remember the last folder from which I imported a project, and use it as the default folder for future imports.
SR: Implement a feature that remembers the last folder used for importing projects and sets it as the default folder for subsequent imports.
